ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Nor will I worship what you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor will I worship what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: nor will I worship those whom you have worshipped;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I have not been worshipping what you worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And neither will I ever worship what you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I shall not worship that which you are worshipping."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor am I going to serve that which you serve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: nor am I serving what you have served,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I shall not worship that which ye worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I will never worship what you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I shall not be a worshipper of that which ye have worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: nor will I worship what you have worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And I will not worship that which ye have been wont to worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I shall not worship that which you are worshipping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Nor am I worshiping what you have worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor do I serve what you serve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [109:4] nor will I worship, in the future, what you have worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I shall not worship that which ye worship) beside Allah.
